My two teen daughters were recently going to a school dance and needed new dresses as they both have outgrown their previous ones. One daughter found a dress locally that we purchased but the other daughter wanted to look online hoping for a greater selection.

We found this dress and, at $35-$40, it was priced similarly to the dress purchased locally. In addition, it is similar (not identical) in styling and both dresses are black. We purchased it thinking that the quality would be comparable but... it definitely is not!

This dress is made of a cheap lace and underlining and is not constructed nearly as well as the dress we purchased locally (that one fit well and has a zip-up back). In addition, there was a small hole in the lining in the back and the dress had deep creases and wrinkles that were difficult to remove because the manufacturer had crumpled up dress and crammed it into a bag that was much too small. The bust area runs large because of the long shoulder straps and the dress left my daughter uncomfortable due to the amount of cleavage that was left on display. Fortunately, I know how to sew and was able to take in the straps and repair the hole (we did not have enough time to return the dress and re-order a different one). Since there isn't a zipper or button in back, however, we were limited in the amount the dress could be altered (without deconstructing the entire thing) while still allowing for enough headroom to slip the dress on. So, if you are smaller breasted, this dress may not work for you at all. A couple of the seams were rather ratty, too, and we had to snip several threads that were sticking out in random places. Although the dress (after alterations) was cute once she was wearing it (hence 2 stars rather than one), neither of us would purchase it again.

You get what you pay

I've been collecting watches for a couple of years now and I have to say that I got this watch just because it is a different style compared to my other watches. I really like the color and the dial is pretty simplistic. It also has a Japanese movement, and i am a big fan of Japanese movements. Personally, I think the watch is pretty stylish and looks great from a distance. But if you were to get up close to this watch you would see exactly why it costs as much as it does. There is dust on the dial which means that the factory this was completed in was not that clean. The glass edges are rough and appears cheaply produced. The sub-dials do not work, or at least there is no way to change the month or date (it might work, but has no way to change the sub-dials from their preset date/month, I do not know). The crown has a lot of play in it when you change the date, and leads the minute and hour hand jumping when you try to set the time. The case is reportedly stainless steel, but i am not sure if that is true (it doesn't look like any of the other true stainless steel watches I have). The back is a snap back and is probably not water tight. The description for the watch states that the band is "leather", however the Watch Information section states that it is "Letherette". The strap is definitely not real leather, this description is something they need to fix. The clasp is not too bad, but there is still a good amount of play in it. This makes it difficult to actually put the watch on because the strap is so thick and hard to flex. The little loops that hold the strap down are very cheaply made and are hard to use with the thick/non-flexible strap. Overall this watch has very few positives going for it: japanese movement and style; while having multiple negatives. I'd recommend it for anyone that buys watches just for stylistic points and does not care about functionality or quality.

I received this product with a discount in exchange for an honest review from amazonreviewtrader.com. My rating is non biased and comes from my experiences with the product. I am not compensated for this review and I am not coerced into giving a positive review in exchange for a product/discount.

reviewText:
To the girl who posted the picture about this dress with a weird hemline: I just received mine yesterday and it does NOT look like that. You must have ordered a different dress or they really cheated you. I really like it! It fits perfectly! I'm usually a size 2-4 with dresses, weigh around 116 pounds and I'm 5'3 in height. I ordered a small since I figured it was a loose dress that would fit fine around my waist and bust, and it did! If you're a 34B and have my body build described above, I recommend buying a small unless you like it to fit looser. I bought this for a wedding and I think it'll look really cute! The color is a bit more pink than in this photo. The color in the photos is more pinkish beige, the dress I received in more baby pink, or lighter pink. Definitely more pink, either way really cute color.

Pro: fits nicely around my bust/waist area. Straps are adjustable so the front portion isn't loose or showing anything. Material does not look cheap, hems are nice and organized, well-made. Low-cut area is well-made and looks sexy, yet classy!

Cons: REALLY see-through! Not really in the chest area or frontal region, (although it wouldn't hurt to cover that area either but it would be more difficult since it is cut low) but when I looked at the back part near my bottom, I could see my underwear! It was a bit embarrassing so I definitely recommend wearing at least a white/pink/beige skirt or slip of some sort to cover that area. Like I mentioned above, I am a bit on the shorter side. I'm 5'3 and this dress could fit someone that was 5'8 WITH heels and still graze the ground or cover their shoes! It was dragging terribly even when I was in heels! I recommend getting it cut/altered, as this dress is way too long even for the average sized woman wearing heels. It is probably for a model. I wouldn't recommend it for a more modest person, since it is cut low and does show lots of back area.

It is a beautiful dress and I definitely would recommend it! The price matches somewhat matches the quality of the product, but I would consider putting it on sale somehow.
summary: Great dress, could be cheaper, but the quality is pretty good!

When we brought it to a seamstress to shorten we learned that it was a "rolled"  hem which is labor intensive and would have cost about $65 to  complete; shows you the quality of stitching.  Gems were sewn on and I felt was very good quality and my daughter was extremely happy.  Exactly as pictured.  I would buy from vendor again but provide measurements to ensure changes aren't necessary. Thanks!

Wow! Was I pleasantly surprised! I rarely find dressy slacks that fit without major adjustments! These size 18s are a couple of inches too long, but that's an easy fix. I ALWAYS have to hem my pants, since I am 5'4, about 180lbs and very short-waisted. My husband calls me "dumpling" (affectionately, but it's also a fair description of my body type). Thus, the 'petite' tends to be too short. The fabric is soft and stretchy without being baggy. I agree that getting the larger size and washing before wearing is a good plan. My Ivory slacks shrunk up just enough after washing and 20 minutes in a warm (not hot!) dryer, that the fit was perfect, where pre-wash, they were a bit loose in the waist. (I also got a pair in Olive, which feel the same, but I haven't washed/dried those yet.) Mind you, I am a dumpling, built like a boy. Straight waist, slim legs. If you are slim-waisted with full thighs, this cut won't flatter you.
11/25/16 Update
So I have since ordered a total of 8 pairs !! in size 18, various colors. The last 4 are en route, but so far, the quality and fit are very consistent. (It's so annoying when you purchase the same product in a different color and it's not the same quality or fit!) I intend to make these my primary slacks for work. I recently had abdominal surgery with multiple incisions that are slow to heal, and I must wear dress slacks to work. The buttons, zippers and bulky plackets of my ordinary slacks were so painful! These pants have a sturdy, stretchy, but soft texture that is perfect. BTW - I did order up a size so that when I sit, the waistband doesn't pinch and chafe. I love them!
summary: Very nice slacks at a perfect price!

I'm not much of a girly girl, but maxi skirts and t-shirts are an easy way to get through the heat of a Southern California summer.  I have purchased a few of Azules skirts in different colors.  So far all of them are well-made in a soft, flowy fabric that is pretty close to exactly the color shown (taking monitor differences into consideration, of course.) The color called "silver" actually is a light, silvery grey, not a heather grey at all, and the eggplant color is a gorgeous, rich purple.  And the fit is right on.  I'm just under 5'6" tall and a curvy/muscular 160lbs, and the size large fits me perfectly.  I'm sure I'll order more of these maxis in the future in other colors.  I like that I can fold the top over if I want to wear sandals or flats with it, or unfolded to get that extra length on that rare occasion I actually don heels.  I should add that I wear Jockey's smoothing slipshorts underneath because they are great at killing the lumps and bumps all women have (to varying degrees) on their backside.  That way I not only don't worry about the cling of the material of the skirt, I also have the confidence of knowing it accentuates my firm, round backside. (Btw, Target carries those Jockeys at a much better price - $12 - than I've found them for here on Amazon.)

To quote my boyfriend, "I never liked those skirts on women before, they usually look frumpy.  But on you, it's just sexy as hell."  Yes, he is a very smart man.  =)  That's why I keep him.

Oh, if you're looking for a maxi that is more airy and revealing, take a look at VIV Collection's side slit maxis.  Those and the Azules are my favorites because of consistency of quality and fit.  I tend to rotate through them just to keep him guessing.

reviewText: A little loose, but stays on.  Great color combo!

I have historically been a person who didn't much care about what my sunglasses looked like, only that they fit well (didn't hurt) and did the job of shading my light-sensitive eyes from the sun. In the past few months, I went on a hunt for some more stylish sunglasses that also looked good and had UVA/B protection. I came across these and really liked the look, especially the color.

To be honest, I never noticed that the top edge was tortoise shell pattern. If you are looking for that to be a stand-out feature, it isn't. I have had several pictures of me taken wearing these glasses and you would never know the top edge was tortoise. Unless you look really close, it just looks like a dark band across the top. This isn't an issue FOR ME, but it may be for some. The bottom of the shades are sort of a sea glass color.

The first time I put these on to go outside, I was REALLY impressed. They were SO clear! They did not distort the color of things so much like my Foster Grant sunglasses, and my vision was just overall clearer (to be fair, my Foster Grants are "well loved").

I was frankly surprised they were sold as "Cat-eye," because the cat-eye shape is not pronounced at all (especially compared to another pair from a different company I bought that were very pointy at the outer edges and had a very obvious cat-eye shape). I don't care if they're cat-eye or not. I just love them! I get compliments constantly...first time I remember getting compliments on a pair of sunglasses!

I am very happy with these!

UPDATE 8/25/16: My glasses unfortunately broke this past week. I tried gluing them, but it didn't take. They broke at the top inside of the right eye frame and the lens fell out while I was walking the dog. The break is at a place that is crucial to keep the lens in, so that sucks. As a result of breakage this soon after buying the glasses, I've lowered my rating to 4 stars. Really should be 3, but I do love these glasses.
summary: Not distinctly cat-eye, but super cute and I love the sea glass color of the lower frame.

reviewText: I got these at a local art museum and love them!  They have the interesting combination of the tortoiseshell with a cool minty green and are from ICU eyeywear's Studio line.  ICU classifies the color as blue, but I'm not sure how - these are mint green to me.  The frames are made of recycled materials.  One of the things I look for in summer glasses is that I can put them on top of my head and shake my head without them falling off.  I have scratched many a pair of glasses by tipping them off my head this way.  The only other glasses I have that stay on my head this way are a sport pair from another company.  These look much more casual and less like I'm about to do a 20 mile bike ride and are a great price - may I not lose them or scratch them before summer's end!
summary: Love the tortoise and mint combo

Well, I guess you get what you pay for bc after my 3 year old has been wearing these (mind you she only wears these to 1/2 day preschool and not outdoors to play in), the soles on BOTH shoes are literally coming apart from the shoes. reviewText:
I'm somewhat torn on how many stars to give this, but had to settle on three in the end.  I would give the burp cloth with the EGA four stars since the EGA itself is really great and has stood up to multiple uses and washings.  The tan one would only get 2 stars since its... well... its just tan. Nothing interesting about it at all!  The desert cammie one is nice, but the MARPAT would have been better.  All three are a good size and the material is absorbent enough for the messiest yack.  And I do really like how the shape of each sort of wraps around the neck to provide good coverage on the front and back of the shoulder.
Probably my biggest complaint is how much they shrank and changed shape after washing.  It took a LOT of ironing to get them levelled back out and no longer all twisty/shrunken looking.  So as much as I love the EGA as a novelty, they wouldn't be something I would buy again.... unless as a gift for a MARSpouse.
summary: Love the EGA, not the burpcloths themselves.

As an online shopper I rely heavily on reviews left by others when trying to decide what to buy so I try to leave useful reviews for those products that I feel strongly about. Please let me know if you find my review helpful. Thanks so much.

I received this charm from the manufacturer at no cost for evaluation, and here are my thoughts.

This sterling silver crystal inlaid charm is lovely.  Made of brightly polished sterling silver, the charm has fifty small blue and clear colored Swarovski Crystals individually set in an open design that lets light move around the stones from all angles to increase their sparkle. The more light strikes the tiny crystals the more they shimmer and sparkle.

Measuring 0.39" high, 0.43" wide, the charm has a 1/8" opening which makes it the perfect size to fit Pandora style bracelets or to wear on a necklace. Unlike some charms that are crudely finished, this charm has been meticulously hand polished to perfection and has no surface scratches or visual flaws that I could see. Marked Nina and S925 on one end, the charm fit my Pandora style bracelet perfectly and looks gorgeous
lovely
This openwork charm is adorable and is a great addition to my Pandora bracelet!
This is a nice charm. The blue stones are darker than pictured so they are not as vibrant as I had hoped. Nevertheless this is a very nice charm and well worth the price.

The  Ninaqueen beads are beautifully designed and look gorgeous on a Pandora bracelet.  Yes, they are slightly smaller in diameter but it doesn't distract since the look is for unique, separate beads, isn't it?  Lastly, the price for this quality is really awesome! Will be purchasing more!
summary: The Ninaqueen beads are beautifully designed and look gorgeous on a Pandora bracelet

This adhesive bra was life changing! I wore them for a formal event with a backless dress. I do recommend as others said practicing beforehand. They didn't go on how I thought they were supposed to, so just follow the directions and practice well before hand so you can wash them and they will be dry and ready to reapply in time for when you need them. They didn't hold me up like a regular bra (which, let's be honest, takes a lot with size D boobs after three kids), but they gave the appearance of them being right where they should with my dress on. They were super comfortable and most importantly, the girls looked great, dare I say, even like they hadn't sacrificed themselves for the sake of three children. That alone makes them five star worthy! ;)
summary: I do recommend as others said practicing beforehand

reviewText: This tote bag is a really well made and attractive bag. I guarantee it will draw attention to your outfit when you go out. The appearance isn't the only feature, though. It will easily carry your laptop, smart phone, and everything else you need to take along. Handy zipper compartments keep things in their place. When I presented this to my granddaughter, she replied, "awesome!".

This Desertwolf Vintage Canvas Tote bag is exactly what I was looking for. It can be worn as a crossbody bag or a shoulder bag. It is made from a thick canvas and the color is suited to match almost any wardrobe. The bag is roomy and sturdy. Very well made and attractive.

Very nice canvas tote bag. The material is strong, the straps are very sturdy and the overall design is one that has appeal to the youthful as well as a grandmother such as I. My granddaughter thought this bag was top of the trees. I particularly like the fact the bag has a flap on the side which covers a pocket with enough depth to carry a small book, a Kindle or other type of small e-book. In addition, the flap also covers a zippered pocket pouch which is large enough for a phone, wallet or other items. The other side of the bag has another zippered pocket which is deep enough to store a phone, checkbook or thin wallet. Lots of options for those of us who must have our electronics, wallets, and other items really handy.

Inside the bag, there is enough depth and room to carry a number of items. There is also another zippered compartment inside the bag where one could store items which need additional security such as cash or keys. A very nice bag overall and I'm of the opinion it will wear well for years with even a minimum amount of care.

Sample provided for testing and review.

This was a well constructed bag that is much larger than I first thought. My wife was able to easily move items from her other purse into this bag and she loved the different sections within the bag itself. The strap was strong and held the bag well. The stitching was complete and I can tell that it will hold up well over time. I am very impressed with this bag and believe that you will be too!

*I received this for review, all opinions are my own*
summary: I am very impressed with this bag and believe that you will be too!

reviewText:
I borrowed this bag from a friend while visiting NYC. It is perfect for travel! It not only holds a lot (I could throw a sweater of spare pair of shoes in there) but it is also very secure. It zips in the middle then folds over and fastens to the bag, great when in areas with lots of pick pocketers. It also has a side zipper along the other side (which is pressed to your body) that allows quick access to the bag without messing with the fastener. It is made with sturdy, durable fabric and has comfortable straps, even when the purse is fully loaded and heavy.
I ordered the bag while on my trip so I had it when I got home. I've had four other friends and family members buy the purse after showing them its features. I would highly recommend this product.

I love this bag. I love oversized purses and this one fits the bill. it could be an overnight bag or a perfect carry on, or even a diaper bag. I have to give it only three stars though because while it's nice a sturdy otherwise, the zipper on the back pocket where I keep my keys, phone, and other items I need often broke after the first month of using the bag. the zipper pull fell off and therefore that pocket is pretty much unusable. then the zipper on one of the inside pockets where I HAD been storing those items since the back zipper busted broke as well, and I couldn't get to those items without having to cut a hole in the pocket itself. overall the quality is decent, but I expected it to last much longer. I've been carrying it for four months now and finally got around to buying something else because two of the storage pockets aren't functional any longer.
I love the style of this bag.  Still gets five stars, even though it's a little deep and I can't find everything I put in there right away.  It makes me feel like Mary Poppins.
summary: I love the style of this bag

reviewerName: Gina Pera, Adult ADHD Expert and Author
reviewText:
This vendor does a nice job of furnishing detailed photos in the product descriptions above. They are "true" and worth checking out.

Normally, I use a medium-size black leather bag, with built-in compartments for cash, credit cards, etc. Its very minimal and organized.

But sometimes, a black leather bag is too dressy, and mine is definitely too small to accommodate a notebook, iPad, water bottle, and whatever else I might need when attending, say, a concert at the park, an art festival, or any number of events.

This hobo bag perfectly fits my needs.  The gray color is neutral and informal but still stylish.

Other features:

3 large zippered pockets
Zippered pocket on outside for easy access
Can wear as shoulder bag or cross-body (strap is adaptable)
Strong canvas material with good stitching
Brass zippers are strong, the color and tab design fit with casual style

I received this product for review.

I love love love this bag!  It is waterproof, has amazingly deep pockets, I can string it across my chest so my shoulders bear all the weight, and I love the amazing amount of pockets and zippered areas both inside and out.  It has two roomy zippered pouches sewn inside, along with a wall pouch on the inside to hold cell phones.  the inside completely zips up, so you can be sure to thwart any pick pockets.

It has a convenient outside zippered roomy pouch that could easily hold most large size wallets and an iphone and pepper spray.  About the only thing I think they could have done differently was make the straps more adjustable.  If I were to fill this up with bricks, and carry it around, I honestly don't think the straps would fall apart.  I think they're leather, but I know for sure, they are sewn and grommetted into the bag so that this bag will hold together even through a zombie attack.  Matter of fact,  I was gifted with a bag to write a review, and the day it arrived I used it to carry the office mail to the post office in a Florida downpour, which as we all know can sometimes resemble Noah's flood.

Bottom line: it's well made, a great statement as part of your wardrobe (after all a purse is part of the outfit no?) and IMO would look great on just about anybody.
summary: Thick Durable Bag Suitable for Escaping Zombies

reviewText:
This is a very heavy duty canvas hobo bag. The canvas is a heavy weight canvas. The hardware is also a nice heavy duty metal with nice large zipper pulls that are easy to zip. It has a nice long leather strap with a wide area so that it doesn't hurt your shoulder while carrying. The inside of the bag is fully lined with what looks like a lighter weight canvas fabric. In addition to the roomy inside of the bag, there are three pockets. Two pockets with zippers and a non closing pocket in between the two zippered pockets. There is also a pocket with a zipper on the outside of the bag.

The inside is roomy and you could easily stick an iPad or laptop inside it, and you wouldn't have to worry about the bag ripping and dropping your tech devices because the fabric wasn't heavy enough. This fabric will hold some weight and hold up well.

And now the artist in me is going to come out. This is basically a blank canvas that begs to be decorated and customized which is exactly what I plan to do with it. I see some painting in it's future as well as some studs and other decorations. I'm going to have much fun with it.
Sample provided in exchange for an honest review.
summary: Quality canvas bag. Roomy and heavy duty. I'm going to decorate mine.

reviewText: Quick delivery. Exactly what I want with an inexpensive leather purse. reviewText:
Men's 316L Stainless Steel Leather Rope Bracelet Cuff Bangle Silver Black

I chose this bracelet for my adult son, who loves to wear jewelry.  The bracelet is made with stainless steel.  It is made of a very strong, pliable material.  It is hypoallergenic and doesn't turn his skin green like many other materials. This bracelet is 8.38" long and 3.51" wide.  He is a large boned guy weighing in a little over 200 pounds, standing 6'3 and it fits him nicely.

The bracelet is very attractive and can be worn casual or dressed up, he wears it with everything and loves it!  I would recommend this purchase for any young man.  He is actually almost 28 and still loves it and gets many compliments on this piece of jewelry.

I received this item Free in exchange for my unbiased product review.  Regardless the opinions found herein are based on my experiences with the product and are 100% my own.

When worn off the shoulders, it is very comfortable and the elastic holds well without slipped. The only thing I wish they would have changed is the white elastic large band used on the inside around the top as you can see this a little from the front. Also - if you are wearing it on the shoulders rather than off the shoulders, the arm holes are a bit small and the fabric may rub against you. The stitching is sturdy and the blouse is 2 layers thick. Overall I am very pleased with the product and I like the large sleeves. *I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.*

I'm always on the look out for simple yet beautiful jewelry pieces that make a statement about who I am inside and I have definitely found it in the Wild Pink Rose Camo Ring. This delicate and beautiful ring is a great gift for a birthday, christmas, or anniversary for ladies who love nature, is a country girl at heart or live the all out Camo Life. This ring features a beautiful inlay pattern of pink roses with a woodland background.  It has a comfort fit design with a sealed inlay so as not to be harmed by the elements, normal hand washing or house hold chores.  Since receiving my Wild Pink Rose Camo Ring I've worn it all day everyday without incident. It has a smooth true to size fit that doesn't irritate your skin because of the surgical grade stainless steel used in its creation. I absolutely love my Wild Pink Rose Camo Ring find myself picking nail polish colors to match it.  I recieved this product for free in exchange for an unbiased review but at 70% of its regular retail value I highly recommend purchasing one of your own.

This ring is absolutely gorgeous! I'm into camo and so is hubby. Sometimes we find ourselves buying something because it is camo. When I saw this ring I thought it was amazing!! It has a camo background with pronounced pink roses on it that make it very girly while very camo at the same time! This is used as my wedding band and I think I'm totally lucky to have it! On multiple occasions I've been asked where I got it and told it is something other's would like...probably because I live out in the country area where camo is a big thing!

My hubby got one from this company too and matches mine he always gets geeked telling people I have a camo wedding ring!

Simple things that make a country girl happy but camo and roses is for sure one of those things! The ring is not heavy but not overly light either, it has a nice shine to it and the picture on the inside of the ring is very clear and beautiful! Props to the company, this ring is beautiful!

**I received a free product for a review. My opinions are 100% honest and my own.**

Beautiful crafted ring. Great for any occasion. The Pink rose is just the  right amount of feminism to the camo design. I love the comfort fit. i love that I can wear this ring with a pair of jeans and a tee shirt. Its a great ring. I received this at a discounted price for my honest review.

I love this Wild Pink Rose Camo Ring! Before I used it I cleaned it. It didn't rust, the inside of the ring still looks shiny to me. I have never worn a ring with flowers on it that I remember. It brightens up my day to look down at this ring on my hand!

This ring can be ordered in different sizes. Please find out what size ring you need before ordering. I tried a ring sizer on the internet that walked through directions on how to find what size I would need for a certain finger. I must have not used thin enough paper because it doesn't fit on the finger I wanted it to but it does fit on another one (which I am grateful for). If you like flowers and you like rings, this product might be right for you!

Using this ring has encouraged me to possibly try to find other rings with other types of flowers on them, to wear on my other fingers.

I received this product at a heavy discount in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.
summary: It brightens up my day to look at this ring on my hand!

You will be sure to get complimented on this adorable top no matter how you choose to wear it!  Over a swimsuit or over a cami, this is the perfect summer top. When I purchased my first sunglasses from Costa Del Mar in '15, I received, along with the sunglasses as part of a package, a custom KC baseball hat and cleaning cloth.  While I couldn't care about the two items, both were part of the original package sold by Costa Del Mar. While there is some stretch to it, the part right under the bust is so narrow that I can see my rib cage poking through the fabric---it is stretched that tight! I think a medium would have been too big. The sizing is off. I don't find the fit very comfortable, but I planned to wear this to an event so will keep it and hope the zipper doesn't break. Will have to wear a belt with it to make the tight part look less noticeable. I am glad I did not order a petticoat to wear with it. The skirt is very full as  is and has a ruffle around the bottom.
summary: Pretty color, but feels like a corset! :(

This Key of Heart Charm Bracelet is loaded with lots of different charms. My bracelet has 3 glass beads that have pink, purple and white. The trim on the glass beads are silver. I also have 2 gold charms that have 5 purple stones. There are 4 gold charms that look like puppy feet in the shape of a heart. Also are 4 more gold charms that are just a decorative piece. There are two dangle charms. One is a gold flower with a purple stone and the other is a heart key lock with a heart key.

The snake chain bracelet is silver but has a gold clasp which is not easy to open. It does seem to get easier with more use. It is stamped with 925. Theres also a gold sunflower safety chain so the charms don't fall off. The safety chain is a screw on and can simply be screwed off over the end of the bracelet if needed. This allows you to add or remove charms.

I ordered the 18cm bracelet because I have small wrists. It actually fits me pretty well. The bracelet is fairly heavy weighing at 2oz. The bracelet and charms seem to be very durable. The gold is bold but I don't like the mix of the silver glass beads and the silver bracelet with it. This definitely needs to have a gold bracelet. It just throws of the look to me. Other than that, its very pretty. It would make a great gift option for a teen or adult. I received this product for free in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.
summary: Unique Looking Charm Bracelet with Lots of Charms but Dont Like the Silver and Gold Mix

reviewText:
Is it possible? Can this Pandora style charm/beaded bracelet really sell for under $10?  pandora better beware!  My Wife loves pandora beads and charm bracelets but lets face it one bead can cost up $25 to $50 each.  This beaded Bracelet from Bamoer is a wonderful duplicate of Pandora and you get the entire bracelet and 18 beads and charms all for under $10.  i mean that is just crazy.

The bracelet and beads are silver plated and gold colored.  the bracelet itself is 20 cm in length or around 9" so should fit most girls/women.  The beads themselves have a great deal of variety in their design.  There are several different  styles of beads and charms so there isn't much duplication. A number are set with dark purple murano glass stones.  The most interesting are the three hand-painted glaze beads which are all different really catch your eye. You have plenty of room to add your own charms if you are so inclined.

This really has a gorgeous look.  It grabs the light and sparkles brightly.  This is a piece that will look good with any attire.  You cannot go wrong for this price.  They make great gifts with Christmas coming soon.
summary: pandora better beware! My Wife loves pandora beads and charm ...

reviewText: This was way smaller than it looked in the picture. It is the size a child might wear.

I don't usually write reviews on things I purchase here but felt the need to do so about these. Buying glasses for a baby/toddler can be very confusing. Too many chain optical shoppes do not carry these small sizes the little ones need!  These optical shops far too often sell trusting parents frames for thieir baby/ toddler that are too large for their little faces. These frames are lighter than miraflex which works great for my son who hates anything on his face/ head (slightly SPD). He doesn't even realize he is wearing these frames! We ordered the stay puts (hates the strap) and they work wonderfully! They don't budge and my son is very active. We ordered a back up pair since & had transitions put in them (filled at Walmart for $79!) I highly recommend these frames- the price is great and very durable for my 3 year old.

We bought this for our daughter, not only she look great she not complain about any discomforts, also she's been using that for 4 months and we can say that the quality still  very good, the rubber band keep strong, highly recommended.

reviewText: Pretty good fit, though it feels a little thicker/less breathable than other similar types of socks. Still, it's a good value and decent sock.

Wonderful socks.  Worth the money.  Updated 7-22-16  After extensive use as a bicycle sock I could not be more impressed with the fit and comfort.  I had also bought the Belega Blister Resistant Mohair sock at $10 per pair at the same time.  They were equally wonderful and comfortable with exceptional manufacturing.  At 1/3 the cost (3pr/$10) though I will definitely go with the Russell Athletic Unisex Performance quarter socks again.  I am very rough on socks and I just hope they hold up as well as they perform.  This we will see. These socks have a thinner layer across the top of the foot.  The socks wick the moisture away so well that after 3 hours of riding in 100+ degree weather here in Oklahoma city, Oklahoma I don't even know that my feet are sweating or even moist.  For longer rides I do plan on taking along an extra pair of socks to switch out after 3-4 hours. This is something I learned in the military.  No sock is perfect.  Take care of your feet!  These socks are about as close as you can get to perfection.  If they had been manufactured from wool they would have been perfect.  I love these socks and I highly recommend them.  I purchased these socks at full cost and with my own money!  I received no reimbursement for this review and I have no affiliation with Russell Socks.

reviewText: Nice fit, plus shipping was quick. We were able to put together a really great cosplay without breaking the bank.

Very nice purse/clutch.  Sometimes you need a purse that will hold just a bit more then a clutch will, but you don't want a huge purse or bag.  This is the perfect mix.  This woven pattern is a subtle classic style and will look great with whatever outfit you are wearing at the time.  Although small, it's big enough to hold all the necessary essentials. The inner lining is very nice, the fabric is strong but elegant.  There are a few pockets to help organize your items.  There is ano adjustable strap so you can wear it on your shoulder or disconnect it to use the wrist strap or place it under your arm.  I love the color, it accessorizes wonderfully.
I do reviews for sellers on Amazon, and usually get a discount for the products that I review, and I did as well, on this item.  However, don't mistake my reviews to be based on discounts.  I am 100% honest on what I say about an item I am reviewing.  I read reviews before I purchase an item, I want to know what's good and bad from people that have purchased ahead of me.  I stand firmly in my review on this purse.  It's a great but.
DISCLAIMER:  I received this product discounted in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

Don't let the crossed out $99 fool you. This purse is cheap and you get what you pay for ($12). Although cheap it's cute and it will serve its intended purpose for a girls wine tasting trip (not sure it will last past a weekend). The metal clasp was delivered scratched and the stitching is off at the zipper (see photo) the color is a little darker than it appears in the photos.

I was provided a sample for my honest review.

This purse was a lot larger than I expected from the photo. The bag itself is VERY light weight. The material is very soft and nice to the touch. There is a short strap to carry this as a very large wristlet. The top zipper is easy to open BUT beware of the inner liner catching. The inside is lined with a thin fabric. It is not affixed to the inside walls. Therefore, if the liner is shifted up, it can get caught in the zipper teeth when opening. When I opened mine for the very first time the material got stuck.  I managed to free the zipper and inside there are three separate compartments.  The liner inside can be pulled and lifted up and out of the bag for easy cleaning.

Two compartments are lined with that brown fabric. The center one is synthetic leather as the exterior of the purse. There are two open top pockets for putting your cell phone inside and one zippered pocket which is nice and big. This comes with a shoulder strap that is soft and comfortable.  This purse has a nice capacity and can easily fit a small catalog, a retractable selfie stick, and much more.

Because this purse is soft and not structured, this makes a nice bag for traveling. The locking clasp for the zipper adds more security.
summary: Big purse with a cute look

reviewText:
Ok so everyone has their "thing".  Mine are bags/purses/pocketbooks,  whatever you'd like to call them.  I ordered this bag the second I saw it.  I have a variety of colors, but not a mustard yellow.  This bag is made of Ostrich and wow is it soft!  This supplement bag has a gold clasp that secures it, and an inner bag that you can totally pull out of the bag if you don't need it.  The soft dots all along the purse add a very nice texture to it.  Two hands allow you to hold it in your hand or there is a detachable strap so you can carry it on your shoulder.  The stitching is very tight,  well made. Perfect adjustable strap so you can put it at any height you might need.  I really like this bag, it's very roomy, no need to worry about what will or won't fit.
DISCLAIMER:  I received this product discounted in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

I like this purse. It's less of a true yellow and instead a more golden with dark camel-colored spots. The handles and fastener are in a cool light beige. It is well made and the pockets are large. The inside large pocket is zippered and also in the same ostrich skin. It arrived in a nice bag inside of the box which will be great for storage from dust and light damage.

Received this purse today.  I love the color!!!  Great for summer.  IT is  nice and soft and the handle is long enough to fit comfortably on my shoulder.  Very nice size to hold all my stuff.  Inside center zippered pocket has alot of separate compartments to hold smaller items.  Outside pocket is large enough for my 5s phone.  Would definitely recommend this pocketbook.

What a beautiful bag and for a fraction of the price of other well made, high end bags! I absolutely love this bag. I have Coach, Antonio Melani, D&B, and other name brand and off brand bags and this one is probably one of my all time favorites.  The leather is just so soft with the ostrich look.  The stitching is superb.  It has slim pockets on either end that I can slide my iPhone 6 plus in to ensure I don't loss it in the abyss.  It has a large inside zippered pocket that fits all of my things but on the either side of that zippered pocket is another "slot" if you will for more things that you want to keep separate or maybe have easier access to.  The handles are just large enough that I can slide it over my shoulder and carry the bag just under my arm snuggly, or I can carry hanging down and just gripping the handles.  It has a great clasp that you must squeeze to release, or depress, but it is not obvious so it is just beautiful and not cumbersome looking.  I just absolutely cannot say enough good things about this bag, other than I wish it came in other colors because I would by different colors.  It has a large flat bottom so it sits nicely without falling over.  It has smaller sewn in pockets on the inside for glosses, lipsticks, etc.  I love the color. It is actually a neutral color and not really a bright yellow so it can go with just about anything.  Highly recommend this bag if you are in the market for a well made, beautiful bag.  It is absolutely one of my favorites, for sure.
Update 2/13/18: I have carried this bag for 1.5 years and no cracks, Rips, tears, scuffs, or wear. Best bag I have ever carried!
summary: Great quality, and beautiful.  I cannot say enough good things and I am usually very picky on my bag.

I have the dark brown Vbiger leather belt. I initially purchased this with my husband in mind, who is a guys 34. It seems that if you are a men's USA size 34 that this belt is the perfect fit length wise. If you are much bigger and it will most likely not fit nicely nor properly. I read about this before my purchase, so it was of no consequence to me. Always do your own research. I figured it would be to small for myself. It is one size. I personally think these could even be advertised as unisex. I have even worn this a couple of times, after confiscating it from my husband. We were on a small getaway and I had forgotten my own belt. I was pleasantly surprised that it fit me so well. The leather is soft. I have belts that cost small fortunes and this easily compares. Typically I would never say I would re-purchase, I like this belt that much, I plan to get us a few more in different colors. The package is some of the best I have ever had something arrive in. It is in a nice box with the label and gift-giving ready. I like to surprise my husband with gifts. He was desperately in need of a new quality leather belt. Wearing a side arm is the main reason that I only purchase him very good quality leather belts. My husband needs something to hold up those britches and a heavy sidearm. So far the cow hide leather belt has held up.

The belt buckle is a good metal end. The buckle is easily re-moved with a flat ended screwdriver. Once the buckle is detached from the leather strip, re-sized to your own measurements. If all you are needing is a new hole to make it tighter though, you can easily punch a new hole in the belt with the steel belt punching tool provided in the box. The company gives you a tool to make another hole. Be sure to use a cutting board or scrap piece of wood. You don't want to damage a nice table, dresser or coffee table etc. Measure to where you need the new hole, make a mark, set the tool to where you want the hole and hammer it like a nail. A hole to match the other punctures in the leather will be set into the leather. I already own a set of leather punches. This was the first time I ever received one with a belt. I did overlook that extra feature when I ordered. Overall my assessment is that the look of quality is there without the price tag, the softness is supple yet firm, I like the tool being included, the nice box, the leather smell, the buckle is nice looking and the belt is sturdy enough to hold up pants and a sidearm. I received this product at a discount in exchange for a review of my honest and unbiased opinion.
summary: A sturdy yet unassuming simple leather belt in dark brown

The dress is so cute.. Which is WHY I'm so upset I have to return it. I usually wear around a size 8 in dresses so I ordered a size Large. I somewhat figured the "Asian sizing" warning was telling (note: they don't mention hip measurements in the sizing of the items online which is frustrating) -- but I ordered anyway hoping that the dress might fit because I was so in love with the style. When I received it, however, I somewhat knew right away that it wouldn't work out. The top portion of the dress fit fine -- I'm not a really busty girl as it is (34 B), so the top wasn't an issue. However, as tried to even attempt to slide on the bottom half around my hips, it would not budge. Girls with bigger hips-- beware. Not to mention, the dress was super short as it is, so I'm not too sure how many women would be able to wear this comfortably anyway. As for the make -- it's, okay. Certainly not top-notch materiel, but it stays together. Looks like the pictures. I wish they carried an XL because that would perhaps fit me, but I guess I'm stuck with having to return the Large and leaving it at all. Overall, super poor fit, but really cute looking dress. Not too sure I would order unless you're a more petite looking girl, and definitely size up!
